I see some people are mistaking the moments to be in line with whoever or whatever Champion is in them... Just to clear things up, 7. Draven ofc doesn't use Zhonya's, but the moment is showing that when you forget to use Zhonya's you get undeniably ravaged.... its the message, not the the Champions in the message...
